question: I did istikaarah for marriage and i had the following dream
answer:
QUESTION
I saw myself sitting with my aunts and cousins all laughing and in a happy mood in a previous home which i lived in. They were all going to eat lunch and told me to come but i told them i couldn't because i was waiting on the person who had proposed. Does this indicate I should go ahead and say yes? Jazakallahu Khair
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is a positive sign to accept the proposal.

However, if you have any reservations, you should continue with the
Istikhaara until you are sure and have satisfaction of the heart. You should
also make Mashwara (seek guidance) of your elders in the matter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
